title: Post WWII attempts to improve economy Britain

content.question: The economic conditions described in the passage best explain which of the following actions by the British government after the Second World War?

choices.label: Committing to the defense of Western Europe by joining the NATO alliance
Holding on to resource-rich African colonies after the war
Opposing the expansion of the European Union into Eastern Europe

content.answer: Holding on to resource-rich African colonies after the war

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
